mapper.update: { CALL vk.mwst_f_pa.vp_mwst_ermitteln( p_kdvt_id => #{P_KDVT_ID, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_nur_res_leist => #{P_NUR_RES_LEIST, mode=IN, jdbcType=BOOLEAN} , p_mwst1_sap => #{P_MWST1_SAP, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , p_mwst1_text => #{P_MWST1_TEXT, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , p_mwst1_beginn => #{P_MWST1_BEGINN, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE} , p_mwst1_ende => #{P_MWST1_ENDE, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE} , p_mwst1_basis => #{P_MWST1_BASIS, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_mwst1_satz => #{P_MWST1_SATZ, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_mwst1_betrag => #{P_MWST1_BETRAG, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_mwst2_sap => #{P_MWST2_SAP, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , p_mwst2_text => #{P_MWST2_TEXT, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , p_mwst2_beginn => #{P_MWST2_BEGINN, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE} , p_mwst2_ende => #{P_MWST2_ENDE, mode=IN, jdbcType=DATE} , p_mwst2_basis => #{P_MWST2_BASIS, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_mwst2_satz => #{P_MWST2_SATZ, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} , p_mwst2_betrag => #{P_MWST2_BETRAG, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) }
